articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India's Russian oil purchases more than double 2021 total
articles.description: India has bought more than twice as much crude oil from Russia in the two months since its invasion of Ukraine as it did in the whole of 2021, according to Reuters calculations, as Indian refiners snapped up discounted oil that others have shunned.
articles.content: India's Russian oil purchases since Ukraine invasion more than double 2021 total

articles.title: Vedanta invites bids for natural gas from Barmer field
articles.description: Vedanta plans to auction 0.10 million metric standard cubic meters a day of natural gas on May 12. The supplies will start no later than June 1 and end on May 31, 2023.
articles.content:
Vedanta has invited bids for natural gas from its Barmer field in Rajasthan at a floor price of $7.1 per mmBtu, according to the e-auction document.
